p:
This is typically same as the preparation of PAU- g-PEG without using Upy-containing monomer (UPy). The product was obtained as a white powder (3.60 g, 86.5%); 1H NMR (400 MHz, DMSO- d
6 ) δ ppm 12.12–12.25 (70H, br signal, H x), 3.46–3.50 (36H, br signal, H y), 3.17–3.44, 2.43–2.50, 2.00–2.32, 1.16–1.83 (8H, br signal, 3H x + 5H y); GPC (DMF, RI)/Da M

w 1.42 × 10 5 and M
